label: Sustainable Fashion
description: Clothing and accessories made from eco-friendly and ethical materials and production methods.

subcategories.label: Organic Clothing
subcategories.description: Clothing made from organic materials and produced using sustainable methods.

subcategories.label: Fair Trade Fashion
subcategories.description: Clothing made by workers who are paid fair wages and work in safe conditions.

subcategories.label: Alpaca Clothing
subcategories.description: Clothing made from alpaca wool, a sustainable and eco-friendly material.

subcategories.label: Carbon Fiber Products
subcategories.description: Products made from carbon fiber, a lightweight and durable material.

subcategories.label: Bamboo Clothing
subcategories.description: Clothing made from bamboo, a sustainable and eco-friendly material.
